name: TRI (itch) (Jonas Mumm)
description:
In Tri you must deliver a rare signal to far outposts, past hazardous terrain and malicious enemies. You'll be in control of the Definite Microastral: A device powerfull enough to entrap and push a signal, yet able to navigate them through narrow spaces. The Definite Microastral still demands dead-eye precision and twitchy reflexes when taken to the action.

Keyboards, DirectInput and XInput devices are fully supported!

Originally made for Global Game Jam 2018  at HS Flensburg.

TRI on globalgamejam.org
